sub_title: Head of maintenance and technical (Global) at VTTI B.V.
summary:
Experienced executive with a proven track record in industrial operations and project development and management.

Proficient in all aspects of project lifecycle management, from initial concept to delivery, with expertise in managing complex technical projects, optimizing timelines, budgets, and resources.

Passionate about the new energies sector, staying up-to-date with emerging technologies and trends to identify business growth opportunities.

A natural leader with excellent communication and team-building skills, forging productive relationships with stakeholders to achieve outstanding results.

profile_positions.description:
Developed VTTI's policies on engineering, project management and asset integrity and monitored their implementation across the Group’s business units facilitating faster project FIDs and positive post evaluations on multimillion euro projects.

Governance on the definition and execution of the Group's OPEX and CAPEX investment plans for growth/expansion and asset integrity activities. This contributed to global performance in line with the Group’s business plan and positive benchmark against industry peers.

Technical support to the Business Development function by conducting and leading technical due diligence of brownfield acquisitions and evaluating technical aspects of greenfield developments.

Leading and coaching a global team of engineers and project management specialists. Restructured VTTI's HQ technical team to accommodate the growth and diversification agenda of the Group by recruiting people from target industries.
profile_positions.title: Head of maintenance and technical (Global)

profile_positions.description:
Ensured optimal performance and reliability of oil storage terminals' assets, increasing efficiency and profitability.

Led multimillion euro modification and expansion projects, driving business growth and improving operational capabilities.

Implemented comprehensive technical management system for oil storage terminals, ensuring compliance with international standards and best practices.

Introduced management processes like KPI evaluation and risk-based inspection plans, reducing costs and increasing efficiency.

Member of VTTI’s global process safety auditors' team.

Supported technical due diligence audits and pre-start-up safety reviews for VTTI’s global projects and acquisitions, mitigating risks and ensuring compliance with standards.

Coached company's technical personnel, contributing to their global professional development.
profile_positions.title: Technical Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managed DBOT contract of waste water facility, ensuring compliance with business plan targets through efficient operations with no recordable incidents.

Supported the expansion of the Company's footprint via business development proposals.

Maintained steady state of biological process, reducing chemicals and energy usage.

Recorded statistical info and audit trails, presenting progress and technical reports to the Company's Supervisory board, Client, and regulatory agencies.

Implemented staff recruitment and training programs, creating a high-performing team.

Managed company's quality control system for the operations, asset integrity, and HSE disciplines.

Supervised equipment maintenance and renewal, prioritizing tasks and managing procurement.
profile_positions.title: Plant Manager and various other positions
